document.heading: Government Sport Utility Vehicle Purchasing Amendment Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-231, the “Government Sport Utility Vehicle Purchasing Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-454, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 2, 2002, and October 1, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 23, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-488 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-231 became effective on March 25, 2003.
